description: It didn't take much to lure Jude Collin into the bedroom as our boy Turk Mason shows you how to seduce a straight man.  Turk's doe-like eyes set the bait, the smooth, young, supple skin keeps Jude interested, the bangin' ass which fits nicely in both his hands and the large cock which Jude finds is too hard to resist have a way of making you crave sex.
title: Backroom Exclusives 9, Scene #04
